divs: Sighting DetailsWas going out to walk the dog. Looked up at the stars (it's pretty clear out) and noticed 8 yellow lights hovering in a triangular shape. Checked cell phone-- 9:15pm EST. Lasted till about 9:20. Wasn't scared only mildly curious. Object zinged away very quickly.
